person.bio: Explorer of life. Playful disruptor. Lover of nature, music, and beauty in all its forms. Real estate developer & consultant. Entrepreneur for good.
person.excerpt: Utopian | Co-Founder @ Joint Idea, Life Works Labs, Love Mafia, Urbanista Labs

node.title: Joint Idea
node.excerpt: Joint Idea is a synergy platform that cultivates consciousness, creativity, and serendipity by connecting ideas, people, place, and time.
